If the number of hard links is cached in this {{rlpt|directory_entry}}, returns the cached value. Otherwise, returns:
@1@ {{c|std::filesystem::hard_link_count(path())}},
@2@ {{c|std::filesystem::hard_link_count(path(), ec)}}.

{{par begin}}
{{par|ec|out-parameter for error reporting in the non-throwing overload}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The number of hard links for the referred-to filesystem object.
